elements.name: verifying the Adaction hotel with valid credintials

steps.name: user should be in  login page
user should login with the "gopinathabinayaa" and "gopinath@1993"
they should click login
user should search for the hotel"London","Hotel Creek","Double","1 - One","30-11-2021","31-11-2021","2 - Two"and"2 - Two"
user should click search and click radio button and click on continue
user should enter "Gopinath","Muthukrishnan","Komarapalayam-Namakkal"and"1234567890123456"
user should select card type "Master Card","August","2022"and"123"
user should click on booknow
print the booking Id on the console
user should verify success msg
